title: Grzegorz Skrzecz
text: Grzegorz Skrzecz (born 25 August 1957) is a retired Polish <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201980%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Heavyweight">men's heavyweight</a> event at the <a href="1980%20Summer%20Olympics">1980 Summer Olympics</a>.
